DOC.detailed_description: This study multi-center , non-randomized , non-controlled post-approval study design follow total 1000 consecutive qualify consent subject treat ArteFill course clinical practice approximately twenty-five center . All potential qualifying subject give site give opportunity participate study . Inclusion exclusion criterion limit approve label ArteFill treatment accord approve product labeling . Subjects must previously document negative skin test prior treatment .
DOC.criteria: Subject male nonpregnant female 18 year age old . Subject provide write verbal informed consent . Subject willing comply study instruction return clinic require visit . Subject willing withhold additional aesthetic implant therapy NLF [ e.g. , soft tissue filler : Restylane , Silicone , Radiesse , Sculptra ) implant : gortex , silastic , thread lift , etc . ] duration study . Subject skin pathology condition could interfere evaluation treatment area . Subject immunocompromised opinion investigator disease medical therapy ( e.g. , HIV , use chemotherapy , etc . ) Subject treat follow NLF time interval specify prior start participation study : Bovine collagen 6 month Porcine human collagen one year Hyaluronic acid one year Hydroxylapatite one year Autologous fat time Polymethylmethacrylate acrylate time Polyacrylamide time Polyethylene oxide time Polylactic acid time Liquid silicone time Other permanent implant material ( FDA approve ) time Subject placement surgical implant NL fold region ( e.g. , Gortex , Silastic implant , thread lift , etc . ) time . Subject history multiple severe allergy allergy manifest anaphylaxis . Subject history allergy lidocaine . Subject history allergy bovine collagen product , include limited injectable collagen , collagen implant , hemostatic sponge , collagenbased suture .
